content: I have psoriatic arthritis. I’ve been fortunate that the only times I’ve been as limited in mobility as you are have been relatively brief but I get it. And I’m in a couple of autoimmune arthritis groups — one for PsA which does involve spondylitis for some of us, one more general including some with AS and some with spinal involvement from RA. These groups have a number of activist types in them. I just shared this and United Airlines *will* be hearing about it. I expect you aren’t inclined to ever fly with them again, but they must make changes to ensure that no future passenger is denied the right to travel with his or her mobility device.
